statements: SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT id, page_url, visit_date FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_url = 'example.com';
SELECT page_url, visit_date, time_on_page FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, referrer_url FROM website_traffic_data WHERE campaign_id IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT page_url, count(*) as page_visits FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY page_url ORDER BY page_visits DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND visit_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT page_url, time_on_page FROM website_traffic_data WHERE TIME(time_on_page) > '00:10:00';
SELECT page_url, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY page_url ORDER BY visit_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE referrer_url IS NOT NULL ORDER BY visit_date DESC, time_on_page ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT referrer_url FROM website_traffic_data WHERE campaign_id IS NULL;
SELECT id, url, visitor_id, traffic_source, visit_time FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT url, traffic_source, visit_time, visitor_id, id FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT visitor_id, url, visit_time FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT id, url, traffic_source FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 1234;
SELECT url, visitor_id, visit_time FROM website_traffic_data WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic' ORDER BY visit_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 5678 AND traffic_source = 'Paid';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(budget) AS max_budget, MIN(budget) AS min_budget, AVG(budget) AS avg_budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT visit_date, page_visited FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 100;
SELECT visitor_id, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY visitor_id;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, SUM(time_spent_on_page) AS total_time_spent FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING SUM(time_spent_on_page) > 100;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE time_spent_on_page > 60 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, page_visited, time_spent_on_page FROM website_traffic_data WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY time_spent_on_page DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, COUNT(*) AS visits_count FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY visitor_id;
SELECT visit_date, AVG(time_spent_on_page) AS avg_time_spent FROM website_traffic_data WHERE campaign_id = 3 GROUP BY visit_date;
SELECT page_visited, COUNT(*) AS page_visits FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 100 GROUP BY page_visited ORDER BY page_visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM WebsiteVisitors;
SELECT visitor_name, page_visited FROM WebsiteVisitors WHERE visit_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name FROM WebsiteVisitors ORDER BY visitor_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT visitor_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM VisitorActions WHERE action_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM WebsiteVisitors;
SELECT visitor_name, page_visited FROM WebsiteVisitors ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, visit_timestamp, page_visited FROM WebsiteVisitors WHERE page_visited = 'homepage';
SELECT v.visitor_id, v.visitor_name, va.action_type, va.action_timestamp FROM WebsiteVisitors v INNER JOIN VisitorActions va ON v.visitor_id = va.visitor_id;
SELECT c.campaign_name, COUNT(ta.visitor_id) AS total_visits FROM Campaigns c LEFT JOIN TrafficAnalysis ta ON c.campaign_id = ta.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT page_url, visitor_id, visit_timestamp FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, AVG(time_spent_per_visit) AS avg_time_spent FROM analysis_results GROUP BY visitor_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT referrer_url, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY referrer_url ORDER BY visit_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 1000;
SELECT page_url, visit_timestamp FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id = 2000 ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_visits, AVG(time_spent_per_visit) AS avg_time_spent FROM analysis_results WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT visitor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT wd.page_url, vd.browser, cd.campaign_name FROM website_traffic_data wd JOIN visitor_details vd ON wd.visitor_id = vd.visitor_id JOIN campaign_data cd ON wd.campaign_id = cd.campaign_id WHERE wd.visitor_id = 3000;
